lyrics.text: Lesson 56. Faster than sound. First listen and then answer the question. How fast did
lyrics.translation: 第56课。比声音更快。首先听，然后回答问题。速度有多快

lyrics.text: the winning car go? Once a year, a race is held for old cars. A lot of cars entered for
lyrics.translation: 获胜的汽车去哪儿了？每年，都会为老爷车举办一场赛车比赛。许多汽车报名参加

lyrics.text: this race last year and with a great deal of excitement just before it began. One of the
lyrics.translation: 去年的这场比赛，在比赛开始前充满了极大的兴奋。其中之一

lyrics.text: most handsome cars was a Rolls Royce Silver Ghost. The most unusual car was a Benz which had only
lyrics.translation: 最帅的汽车是劳斯莱斯银鬼。最不寻常的汽车是一辆奔驰，它只有

lyrics.text: three wheels. Built in 1885, it was the oldest car taking part. After a great many loud explosions,
lyrics.translation: 三个轮子。它建于1885年，是参赛车辆中最古老的。在许多巨大的爆炸声之后，

lyrics.text: the race began. Many of the cars broke down on the course and some drivers spent more time under
lyrics.translation: 比赛开始了。许多汽车在赛道上抛锚，一些车手在赛道下花费了更多时间

lyrics.text: their cars than in them. A few cars however completed the race. The winning car reached a
lyrics.translation: 他们的车比他们自己更出色。然而，有几辆车完成了比赛。获胜的车子达到了

lyrics.text: speed of 40 miles an hour, much faster than any of its rivals. It sped downhill at the end of the
lyrics.translation: 速度为每小时40英里，比它的任何竞争对手都要快得多。它在结束时下坡加速

lyrics.text: race and its driver had a lot of trouble trying to stop it. The race gave everyone a great deal
lyrics.translation: 赛车和它的驾驶员在试图停下来时遇到了很多麻烦。这场比赛给每个人带来了很大的麻烦

lyrics.text: of pleasure. It was very different from modern car races but no less exciting.
lyrics.translation: 乐趣。它与现代汽车比赛非常不同，但同样令人兴奋。
